aka: Doctor Who - Thirty Years In The TARDIS
this_title: Doctor Who - More Than 30 Years In The TARDIS
trans_title: Doctor Who - Thirty Years In The TARDIS
introduction: A specially extended video edition of the documentary filmed to mark the 30th anniversary of the long-running BBC Science Fiction serial, "Doctor Who". Linked by specially filmed footage featuring members of the cast from the series and various old foes & monsters, the show is explored in depth and there are interviews with members of the cast & production team plus input from experts, critics and fans, as well as plenty of (often rarely seen) archive footage and clips from the series.
foreign_title: Doctor Who - More Than 30 Years In The TARDIS
